name: @denodecom/wasm-vips
description: libvips for the browser and Node.js, compiled to WebAssembly with Emscripten
author: Kleis Auke Wolthuizen

scripts.build:base: docker build -t wasm-vips . && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd):/src wasm-vips ./build.sh --clean-build
scripts.build:slim: docker build -t wasm-vips . && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd):/src wasm-vips ./build.sh --variant slim --disable-modules --disable-jxl --disable-avif --disable-svg --disable-analyze --disable-radiance --disable-ppm --disable-gif --disable-tiff --disable-fs
scripts.build:nosimd: docker build -t wasm-vips . && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd):/src wasm-vips ./build.sh --clean-build --variant nosimd --disable-simd
scripts.build: npm run build:base && npm run build:slim && npm run build:nosimd
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:base && npm run test:nosimd && npm run test:slim
scripts.test:slim: npm run test:lint && VARIANT=slim npm run test:node
scripts.test:nosimd: npm run test:lint && VARIANT=nosimd npm run test:node
